EmailTemplate.name: Trial Onboarding - Experienced vs Inexperienced - GTM-1296 / GTM-1274.ACQ - Expe
EmailTemplate.subject: See how we've assisted retailers like you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Check out BigCommerce companies like you. Call 1-844-632-8912 for assistance on selecting a BigCommerce plan today. Log in to your control panel <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+12+Email+8&utm_content=Control+Panel]]> Powerful ecommerce software that grows with you See case studies <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/case-study/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+12+Email+8&utm_content=Case+Study]]> BigCommerce offers the best combination of value and enterprise-grade features to help you take your business to the next level.
Offline to Online
“One of the features I’m most excited to bring to the online store is a very easy, simplistic way of shopping –– a very smooth transition from my brand to the online store.”
— LaQuan Smith, Fashion Designer <[[http://laquansmith.com/]]>
Superior performance + great value “We were able to get everything we needed with more reliability and at a far more affordable cost.”
— Brian Van, Founder, Sportbike Track Gear <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/case-study/sport-bike-track-gear/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+12+Email+8&utm_content=Sport+Bike+Track+Gear]]>
World-Class partnerships and integrations
“BigCommerce’s integrations with ShipStation and InStockNotify have made it possible for our team to perform functions that would have previously taken days or even weeks in a matter of minutes.”
— Chris Gerbig, The Pink Lily Boutique <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/case-study/pink-lily?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+12+Email+8&utm_content=Pink+Lily+Boutique]]> {{my.Litmus Tracker 7:default=editme}}
